## Lab 01 ##
#My lab 1 commands

Let's first load the data
```{r}
lab1<-read.csv("lab1_19.csv")   #Read in the data
lab1                           #view data
head(lab1)                      #view the first few lines of data
```

Data summary

```{r}
summary(lab1$fecundity)
mean(lab1$fecundity)
var(lab1$fecundity)
min(lab1$fecundity)
max(lab1$fecundity)
length(lab1$fecundity)

(max(lab1$fecundity)-min(lab1$fecundity))
```

Histogram of Fecundity in Female Crickets

```{r}
bins=seq(0,1200,length=20) 
hist(lab1$fecundity, bins, xlab= "Mass of ovaries (mg)", ylab= "Number of Females", main= "Fecundity of Female Sand Field Crickets")
```
